wikipedia_page.main:
John Galloway Miller (12 March 1895 – 1956) was a Scottish footballer who played as a forward.He counted Hamilton Academical, Liverpool (8 Football League appearances as well as a full season during wartime), Partick Thistle and Aberdeen among his clubs.
His elders brother Tom (who also played for Hamilton Accies and Liverpool, as well as the Scottish national team), William and Adam were also footballers.
